summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Alley in Block Forty-five A. A. Denny's Addition between 2" to 3" Avenues from Pine Street to Stewart Street in the City of Seattle, by paving same with asphalt under Ordinance No. 18471, creating Local Improvement District No. 1739 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
